rollback.sql: DROP ALIAS INSERT_MESSAGE; DROP ALIAS GET_MESSAGES_BY_CONTENT;

changeSet.comment: Stored Procedures for MySQL and MariaDB

changeSet.author: Tim van der Leeuw
changeSet.comment: Stored Procedures for MS SQL Server

changeSet.author: Tim van der Leeuw
Tim van der Leeuw
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GET_MESSAGES_CURSOR( MESSAGE IN VARCHAR, CNT OUT INTEGER, ROWS1 OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN ROWS1 FOR SELECT * FROM SP_TESTDATA WHERE TMESSAGE = MESSAGE ORDER BY TKEY ; SELECT COUNT(*) INTO CNT FROM SP_TESTDATA WHERE TMESSAGE = MESSAGE; END;
